displayName.text: Astro Gallery of Gems, Minerals and Fossils

authorAttributions.displayName: Astro Gallery of Gems, Minerals and Fossils

adrFormatAddress: 417 5th Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA

editorialSummary.text: Spacious store with colorful, museum-like displays of fine & rare gems, fossils, minerals & jewelry.

originalText.text: Amazing store, amazing ambiance and energy! We loved working with German the sales associate. He gave my wife and I lots of space to shop and look around and was very playful, knowledgeable, helpful, and packed our items up with great care! We will most certainly be back and would recommend this place to anyone looking for genuine stones, meteorites, fossils, coral, or preserved infects/ butterflies. They had so much more than I ever expected to see in one store but it never felt overflow due to the great layout and size of the store.

originalText.text: Beautiful gemstones, rocks, pendants, bracelets, geodes, crystals, decorations, bowls, jewelry, rings, earrings, necklaces, wands, angels, pyramids, furniture, display pieces, home decor, and more! Very expensive but very high quality. Great for gifts, keepsakes, and trinkets

text.text: Beautiful gemstones, rocks, pendants, bracelets, geodes, crystals, decorations, bowls, jewelry, rings, earrings, necklaces, wands, angels, pyramids, furniture, display pieces, home decor, and more! Very expensive but very high quality. Great for gifts, keepsakes, and trinkets

originalText.text:
Astro Gallery of Gems truly stands out as the epitome of natural beauty and wonder. As one of the world's largest gallery of gems, minerals, fossils, and other natural history products, it seamlessly combines education and awe-inspiring aesthetics. The vast collection on display is a testament to the Earth's remarkable geological diversity. Navigating through the gallery feels like embarking on a captivating journey through time and nature. The knowledgeable and courteous staff adds another layer to the experience, offering insights that enhance the appreciation of each exhibit. The prices are amazing! Whether you're a seasoned gem enthusiast or a casual visitor, Astro Gallery of Gems provides an unparalleled exploration of Earth's fascinating treasures. It's a gem in itself among galleries, making it a must-visit for anyone with a curiosity for the marvels of our planet.

Genuine Meteorite ring
Amethyst rock
And much more...

originalText.text:
I love stone and I always visit market trying to find same special peaces, I have traveled in many countries, but I have to admit that I had never found such a collection of beautiful and precious stones all in one place.

The shop has stones of first quality and more over they have very large.

The amethyst of the first picture below is a very special piece. It is in perfect condition.

originalText.text:
Really cool, really pricey...

As someone that loves crystals and dinosaurs and the likes this place is VERY cool. I'd warn against going with kids because some of these are worth hundreds or thousands of dollars, but if you have kids that are mature, they'll love it.

I'll be going back and buy myself a little trilobite fossil, i wish i could afford the beauties that are hundreds of dollars but I'm not that well off.
